field.name: Title
field.description: Add a title. Used as name for the paragraph

field.name: Sort article list by date
field.description: Specify whether you want the list to be sorted by the most recent or the first

field.name: Maximum number of items in the list
Show button
field.description: Enable to show link arrows or link labels (if article has one)

field.name: Show article tags
field.description: Enable to show list of tag badges (if article has any)

field.name: Show article list category
field.description: Enable to show a list category badge (the parent list page of article) The badge will inherit theme from parent list page.

field.name: Article item layout
field.description: Select how you want your content to be displayed

field.name: Article list layout
field.description: Select whether you want it to be in a grid or carousel.

field.name: Grid layout
field.description: Select the number of items you want to display.

field.name: Show load more
field.description: This settings is only respected if Article List is in use on Article List Page. On regular Page the max items in list will be decisive.

field.name: Slider visible items
field.description: Select the number of items you want to display

field.name: Arrow style
field.description: Navigation arrows are shown when hovering the slider. Enable "always visible" to keep navigation visible.

field.name: Image aspect ratio
field.description: For well-cropped image, select an image aspect ratio that matches your content

field.name: Article item shadow
field.description: Add a drop shadow to article item on hover

field.name: Article item "lift"
field.description: "Lift" on article items on hover

field.name: Title size
field.description: Do you want to make your title font size smaller or larger? Select a font size for well-sized content

field.name: Theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style the article list

field.name: Article item theme
field.description: Select a theme (background and text color) to style the article item

field.name: Navigation slide all visible items together
Autoplay interval
field.description: Timeout interval in miliseconds

field.name: List source
field.description: The items below this page are displayed if no page is selected

field.name: List content
field.description: Select content of the list: Articles or article list pages only

field.name: List depth
field.description: "All levels" will get articles/lists including first level.

field.name: List context (Tags)
field.description: Provide a context to the article list - if you want the list to show articles based on Tags N.B: Remember to select list source
